title: Widespread Panic - 2002-11-12 - Bi-Lo Center in Greenville, SC
description:
-- I'M NOT TYPICALLY ONE TO POST AUDIENCE RECORDINGS, BUT THIS IS A RARE EXCEPTION.  IT SOUNDS GREAT!  IT WILL BLOW YOUR MIND...ESPECIALLY THE 'RED BEANS' AND 'STOP-N-G0'.  BLAST IT LOUD! --




Widespread Panic
11/12/2002
Bi-Lo Center
Greenville, SC


Tapers: William Boswell & Jim Pollock
Source: Schoeps MK41 -> KC5 -> CMC6 -> v3 -> AD1000 -> DA-P1
Location: Front Row Center Taper's Section/DIN configuration
Transfer: DA-P1 -> Delta Dio 24/96 -> Soundforge 6.0 -> CD Wave -> mkwACT
*****Fixed 08/05/12*****
SHN > WAV > fix sbe's > FLAC(8)



--- Set 1 ---
[01] Tuning
[02] Little Lilly >
[03] Tie Your Shoes > 
[04] Fixin' To Die 
[05] Pickin' Up The Pieces  *
[06] Doreatha
[07] Skin It Back
[08] Space Wrangler
[09] Red Beans  * > Shake, Rattle, And Roll  * > Red Beans  *


--- Set 2 ---
[01] Tuning
[02] Thought Sausage
[03] Rebirtha > 
[04] Sleeping Man
[05] Dyin' Man
[06] Get In Get Out  ** >
[07] Drums >
[08] Drums >

[11] Crowd


--- Encore ---

[01] Let's Get The Show On The Road  **
[02] Ain't Life Grand  **


* with John Keane on pedal steel
** with Davis Causey on guitar, John Keane on pedal steel

['Satisfied' rap by JB during 'Stop-Go'; Last 'Shake, Rattle, And Roll' - 11/01/96, 588 shows]
